title: Adrenaline Rush Drum Loops
description: Add this collection of original heart pounding drum loops to your Unreal game dev toolbox.  This collection features 40 loops
longDescription:
This music collection includes 40 exhilarating drum loops to add to your games. Each of these heart pounding loops have varying levels of energy and can be used on their own or seamlessly connected.


Demo each track here: https://youtu.be/iAHnH0v36VQ
